title: All-Purpose Gluten Free Flour

preparations.content: Place quinoa and chia seeds into mixing bowl and grind <b>1 min/speed 9<b>.
Add arrowroot flour and corn starch and blend <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>. Store in an airtight container until ready to use.

hintsAndTricks: Try using different flours in this recipe such as soy flour, besan flour (chickpea flour) or sorghum flour. You can also try grinding different grains such as brown rice, amaranth or millet.
To ensure recipe results are truly gluten-free, always check your ingredient labels to ensure traces of wheat or gluten have not been used in the production process.
